## Button class

 A clickable button that can appear in a message.  Buttons will automatically be shown to players if used in a Player.prompt.click(button).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Button implements ITextEmbeddable 
```
**Implements:** [ITextEmbeddable](./bge-core.itextembeddable.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(label)](./bge-core.button._constructor_.md) |  | Create a clickable button that can appear in a message. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [label](./bge-core.button.label.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | Text displayed on this button. |
